description: The requirement is to procure Ubiquiti wireless networking hardware specifically for the standup of a quality-of-life wireless network at our various training sites across Canada.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: Ubiquiti Products or Equivalent

## Solicitation Information

* Solicitation Number: BPM020987/25822
* Publication Date: February 28, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: March 12, 2024 @ 3:00 PM EST
* Amendment Number: 1
* Amendment Date: March 5, 2024

## Contracting Entity Information

* Contracting Entity Name: Shared Services Canada
* Contracting Entity Address:
	+ Address Line: 90 Metcalfe Street
	+ City: Ottawa
	+ Province: Ontario
	+ Postal Code: K0A 0C3
	+ Country: Canada
* Contact Information:
	+ Contact Name: Oliver Librada
	+ Phone Number: 343-542-8460
	+ Fax Number: 343-542-8460
	+ Email: Oliver.librada@ssc.spc.gc.ca

## Tender Description

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking to procure Ubiquiti wireless networking hardware, or equivalent products, for the implementation of a quality-of-life wireless network at various training sites across Canada. The selected hardware devices were chosen based on compatibility and interoperability with existing DND/CAF service infrastructure.

## Tender Submission

Bids must be submitted via P2P Contracting. The tender closing date is March 12, 2024 @ 3:00 PM EST.
